_header: Now goeth falsehood in every flock
_description: Verses claiming Truth is a Prisoner — a single quatrain

BLHar2316.Transcription: Now goot falshed in eueri flokAnd trewthe is sperd vnder a lokNow no man may comen ȝer toBut yef he singge si dedero
BLHar2316.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.121.

BLRoy17Bxvii.Transcription:
How gos gyle in euer ilk flokAnd treuthe is sperrid vndre a
                    lokMay no mon þat lok vndoBut if he syng si dedero
BLRoy17Bxvii.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             Yorkshire Writers.
         2 vols. London, Sonnenschein; New York: Macmillan, 1895-96: 2.65.
